actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 94-846.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution to provide funds for the expenses of the investigations and studies by the Committee on House Administration.

summary.text: Appropriates $660,000 to the House Committee on House Administration for investigations and inquiries to be conducted by the Committee. Allocates $65,000 of such amount for consultants' fees. Directs that no part of the funds authorized by this resolution shall be available for expenditure in connection with the study or investigation of any subject which is being investigated for the same purpose by any other committee of the House.

titles.title: A resolution to provide funds for the expenses of the investigations and studies by the Committee on House Administration.
